meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Becky Peeler Brian Hindelang Jill Kaiser Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4372.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Becky Peeler, a secretary from Bremerton, Washington
Brian Hindelang, an electronics technician from San Antonio, Texas
Jill Kaiser, a trauma center registration secretary from Edgington, Illinois (whose 2-day cash winnings total $28,602)

tr.td: THE NEW YORK TIMES SCIENCE TIMES
'80s MUSIC
INTERNATIONAL AIRPORTS
A PUZZLING CATEGORY
U.S. SENATE HISTORY
"Z" FOR YOURSELF
